description:
Sadly, the Handa Force has two members who need to take the supplementary exam. What they don`t realize is that Handa himself is in the same boat.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Handa et l`examen de rattrapage / Handa et la bibliothèque
Handa-kun and the Supplementary Exam / Handa-kun and the Library
Handa-kun to Tsuishi / Handa-kun to Toshoshitsu
半田くんと追試 / 半田くんと図書室
